citadels

Class UserCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.UserCommands

  • public class UserCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles user commands in the Citadels game, processing various actions such as showing hands, building districts, and using character abilities.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int abilityCount
      Counter to ensure a character ability is only used once per round.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a UserCommands handler.

      • process

        public void process(Player player,
                    java.lang.String[] input,
                    java.util.List<Player> players)
        Processes a user command and dispatches it to the corresponding method.
        Parameters:
        player - the player issuing the command
        input - the command input as a string array
        players - the list of all players
